name: New Zealand
slogan: Imagine earning a globally recognized degree while surrounded by breathtaking landscapes. In New Zealand, you get the best of both worlds—high-quality education and an unbeatable lifestyle. With a strong focus on practical learning, small class sizes, and innovative research, students receive a hands-on education that prepares them for the real world. And when you’re not in class? There’s no shortage of adventures, from hiking and skiing to exploring Maori culture.

universities.name: University of Auckland
universities.description: New Zealand's leading university with a strong international reputation for academic excellence.

universities.name: University of Otago
universities.description: New Zealand's first university known for its vibrant campus life and research excellence.

benefits: New Zealand offers internationally recognized qualifications and a supportive learning environment. Students can work up to 20 hours per week during term and full-time during holidays. Graduates can apply for post-study work visas for 1-3 years. New Zealand consistently ranks among the safest and most peaceful countries in the world. Experience a warm, welcoming culture with a strong emphasis on work-life balance. New Zealand's unique natural environment provides countless opportunities for outdoor adventures and exploration.
